documents.summary: The team aligned on a concrete enablement case for the Achmea pension compliance project: start from the Product & Services Catalog and build a small, relevant subset of the Dutch pension law knowledge graph (rather than ingesting the full ~300M-triple law graph), then expand iteratively. The proof-of-concepts demonstrated registering client choices in a knowledge graph and validating compliance via SHACL, with legal review still required for ambiguous interpretations and with longer-term plans for an ETL pipeline to keep law content updated.
